protocol_name: Mojosort™ Mouse Neutrophil Isolation Kit Protocol
protocol_name_html: Mojosort™ Mouse Neutrophil Isolation Kit Protocol
description: Non Neutrophil cells are depleted by incubating the sample with the biotin antibody cocktail followed by incubation with magnetic Streptavidin Nanobeads. The magnetically labeled fraction is retained by the use of a magnetic separator. The untouched cells are collected. These are the cells of interest; do not discard the liquid. Some of the downstream applications include functional assays, gene expression, phenotypic characterization, etc.
guidelines:
This procedure is optimized for the isolation of 107 to 1 x 108 cells per tube. If working with fewer than 107 cells, keep volumes as indicated for 107 cells. For best results, optimize the conditions to your specific cell number and tissue. Prepare fresh MojoSort™ Buffer solution by diluting the 5X concentrate with sterile distilled water.

 

Application notes: To use this product in magnetic separation columns, a titration of the cocktail/beads should be performed. Optimal concentration for magnetic separation columns is lot-specific. Please contact BioLegend Technical Service (tech@biolegend.com) for further assistance on how to use MojoSort™ Nanobeads in magnetic separation columns.

 

Chart Protocol:

components.data: Pour out and collect the liquid. These are the cells of interest; DO NOT DISCARD.
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Pour out and collect the liquid. These are the cells of interest; DO NOT DISCARD.

components.data: Prepare cells from your tissue of interest without lysing erythrocytes.
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Prepare cells from your tissue of interest without lysing erythrocytes.

components.data: In the final wash of your sample preparation, resuspend the cells in MojoSort™ Buffer by filling up to 4 mL in a 5 mL (12 x 75 mm) polystyrene tube.Note: Keep MojoSort™ Buffer on ice throughout the procedure.
components.name: Description

source_data.description: In the final wash of your sample preparation, resuspend the cells in MojoSort™ Buffer by filling up to 4 mL in a 5 mL (12 x 75 mm) polystyrene tube.Note: Keep MojoSort™ Buffer on ice throughout the procedure.

components.data: Filter the cells with a 70 μm cell strainer, centrifuge at 300 x g for 5 minutes, and resuspend in an appropriate volume of MojoSort™ Buffer. Count and adjust the cell concentration to 1 x 108 cells/mL.
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Filter the cells with a 70 μm cell strainer, centrifuge at 300 x g for 5 minutes, and resuspend in an appropriate volume of MojoSort™ Buffer. Count and adjust the cell concentration to 1 x 108 cells/mL.

components.data:
Aliquot 100 μL of cell suspension (107 cells) into a new tube. Add 10 μL of the Biotin-Antibody Cocktail, mix well and incubate on ice for 15 minutes. Scale up the volume accordingly if separating more cells. For example, add 100 μL for 1 x 108 cells. When working with less than 107 cells, use indicated volumes for 107 cells.

 

Optional: Keep unused cells, or take an aliquot before adding the cocktail to monitor purity and yield.
components.name: Description

source_data.description:
Aliquot 100 μL of cell suspension (107 cells) into a new tube. Add 10 μL of the Biotin-Antibody Cocktail, mix well and incubate on ice for 15 minutes. Scale up the volume accordingly if separating more cells. For example, add 100 μL for 1 x 108 cells. When working with less than 107 cells, use indicated volumes for 107 cells.

 

Optional: Keep unused cells, or take an aliquot before adding the cocktail to monitor purity and yield.

components.data: Wash the cells by adding MojoSort™ Buffer up to 4 mL; centrifuge the cells at 300 x g for 5 minutes.
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Wash the cells by adding MojoSort™ Buffer up to 4 mL; centrifuge the cells at 300 x g for 5 minutes.

components.data: Discard supernatant and resuspend in 100 μL of MojoSort™ Buffer, or volume needed to keep the cells at 1 x 108 cells/mL.
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Discard supernatant and resuspend in 100 μL of MojoSort™ Buffer, or volume needed to keep the cells at 1 x 108 cells/mL.

components.data: Resuspend the beads by vortexing, maximum speed, 5 touches. Add 10 μL of Streptavidin Nanobeads. Mix well and incubate on ice for 15 minutes. Scale up the volume accordingly if separating more cells. For example, add 100 μL for 1 x 108 cells. When working with less than 107 cells, use indicated volumes for 107 cells.
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Resuspend the beads by vortexing, maximum speed, 5 touches. Add 10 μL of Streptavidin Nanobeads. Mix well and incubate on ice for 15 minutes. Scale up the volume accordingly if separating more cells. For example, add 100 μL for 1 x 108 cells. When working with less than 107 cells, use indicated volumes for 107 cells.

components.data:
Add MojoSort™ Buffer up to 2 mL and place the tube in the magnet for 5 minutes place the tube directly in the magnet for 5 minutes. Collect the liquid in a clean tube. DO NOT DISCARD.

 

Optional: Take an aliquot before placing the tube in the magnet to monitor purity and yield.
components.name: Description

source_data.description:
Add MojoSort™ Buffer up to 2 mL and place the tube in the magnet for 5 minutes place the tube directly in the magnet for 5 minutes. Collect the liquid in a clean tube. DO NOT DISCARD.

 

Optional: Take an aliquot before placing the tube in the magnet to monitor purity and yield.

components.data:
Remove the tube from the magnet and resuspend the cells in 2 mL of MojoSort™ Buffer. Place it back into the magnet for 5 minutes. Collect the liquid in the same tube as in step 8. DO NOT DISCARD.

 

Note: If you observe aggregates, filter the suspension. To maximize yield, you can disrupt the aggregates by pipetting the solution up and down.
components.name: Description

source_data.description:
Remove the tube from the magnet and resuspend the cells in 2 mL of MojoSort™ Buffer. Place it back into the magnet for 5 minutes. Collect the liquid in the same tube as in step 8. DO NOT DISCARD.

 

Note: If you observe aggregates, filter the suspension. To maximize yield, you can disrupt the aggregates by pipetting the solution up and down.

components.data: Take the pooled negative fraction tube (should contain 4 mL in addition to the sample volume and Nanobeads volume) and place the tube in the magnet for 5 minutes.
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Take the pooled negative fraction tube (should contain 4 mL in addition to the sample volume and Nanobeads volume) and place the tube in the magnet for 5 minutes.
